article_text:
00:58 Kansas City police shoot woman after long standoff in park Pause

02:39 KC streetcar service suspended because of electrical problem

00:26 Crews cut massive bridge girders at the Johnson County Gateway interchange

02:14 Internal report on Kansas City firefighters' deaths expected this week

02:34 Margaret Lamkin had to fight for her life after eating tenderized beef

01:19 Man killed when his car runs him over

00:44 School bus strikes car and careens into yard

00:29 Union Station streetcar switch halts service

03:19 Witness to car chase: It came around corner on two wheels, mayhem after that

00:32 High water on Missouri 9 delays motorists

article_metadata.news-keywords: news, Kansas, Mission, driveway tax, Court of Appeals, Transportation Utility Fee
article_metadata.description: The court ruled that the fee imposed on developed property in the city is an illegal excise tax under state law. The city had argued the revenue source was a fee, not a tax. The city is evaluating its options.
article_metadata.title: Mission’s ‘driveway tax’ is ruled illegal by Kansas appeals court | The Kansas City Star

og.description: The court ruled that the fee imposed on developed property in the city is an illegal excise tax under state law. The city had argued the revenue source was a fee, not a tax. The city is evaluating its options.
og.title: Mission’s ‘driveway tax’ is ruled illegal by Kansas appeals court
